subSections.title: Etymology
subSections.text: From {{och-l|厲|sharp}} with a nominalizing devoicing, a realization of a {{cog|sit}} prefix ''*s-'', probably the one used in words for animals ({{zh-ref|Schuessler, 2007}}). {{zh-ref|Baxter and Sagart (2014)}} reconstruct it with an additional animal prefix ''*m-''. It may also be connected to {{och-l|蜇|to sting}} ({{zh-ref|Schuessler, 2007}}).

subSections.title: Compounds
subSections.text: {{zh-der|水蠆|蠆尾|蜂蠆有毒|銀鉤蠆尾|蠆芥}}
